experience.description: Conducted an in-depth analysis of stochastic mortality models, specifically comparing Lee-Carter and Cairns-Blake-Dowd frameworks for projecting longevity risk. Managed large datasets of historical census data using R and SQL to identify trends in age-specific mortality rates.

experience.organization: Center for Risk Management and Insurance
experience.description: Assisted in the development of a predictive model for health insurance claim frequency utilizing Generalized Linear Models (GLMs). Evaluated the impact of socioeconomic variables on risk segmentation and presented findings on premium elasticity to departmental faculty.

metadata.experience_level: Relevant research done for the job field.
